pages.text: You find yourself having trouble carrying multiple $(l:focuses)focuses$() on your person. Fortunately, you've managed to devise a leather bag to hold multiple focuses that you can easily access, by either pressing the Focus Bag key (Default: C) or holding a wand and pressing Focus Circle key (Default: X) and can wear on your waist.
The Focus Bag can hold up to 10 focuses.
The Focus Pack can hold up to 20 focuses.
